title: A Dispensational Theology
description: A complete theology book with emphasis on dispensational perspectives, and their related scriptural references, written to be useful for the layman by avoiding theological jargon. An important study guide to clear up the prevalent misunderstandings and misconceptions among Christians concerning the methods and results of dispensational interpretation. Mr. Baker doesn't simply duplicate what has already been written, but he gives prominence to that which has been the dispensational thrust of the scriptures.
author: Charles F. Baker
